On board, people are evacuated following the Russian invasion. This van becomes a fragile and transitory refuge, a zone of confidences and confessions of exiles who have only one objective, to escape the war.","poster_path":"/fw2OQXBVyVwp4h2krYgW3Y7TLnw.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"pl","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":3.037,"release_date":"2023-11-08","video":false,"vote_average":5.4,"vote_count":4},{"backdrop_path":"/bFb0JG8MBk82ADqvyxWBdg4idJN.jpg","id":61662,"title":"We Spin Around the Night Consumed by the Fire","original_title":"In girum imus nocte et consumimur igni","overview":"A Latin palindrome is the title of Guy Debord's last film, in which he, as narrator, explains that he will make neither concessions to the tastes of his viewers nor to the dominant ideas of his day. After extensively insulting the audience that goes to the cinema to forget its heteronomous life, the film becomes autobiographical, using images from the world of spectacle: advertising brochures, clips from feature films (Les enfants du paradis), comics, aerial footage of Paris, tracking shots through Venice, photographs of friends – all commented on by Debord, with an at times melancholy undertone: \"This Paris no longer exists.\" His assessment is that one of the great pleasures of his life has been the sensation of the passage of time, and as a witness to the disintegration of social order, he has loved his epoch.","poster_path":"/scz363a4qKgxLYCX6L0JvgoWRUV.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":1.94,"release_date":"1978-03-12","video":false,"vote_average":6.6,"vote_count":17},{"backdrop_path":"/l6pEbeeAD2spisee51dP2SN7VZP.jpg","id":105583,"title":"Diaries, Notes, and Sketches","original_title":"Diaries, Notes, and Sketches","overview":"An epic portrait of the New York avant-garde art scene of the 60s.","poster_path":"/3iyvGft8nwGJFX62H5RawllN6Gp.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":7.995,"release_date":"1968-03-01","video":false,"vote_average":7.4,"vote_count":20},{"backdrop_path":"/tju4HwFkAAc3xn0KJ5Nk4tUEd5T.jpg","id":42102,"title":"A Sunday in the Country","original_title":"Un dimanche à la campagne","overview":"In France, before WWI. As every Sunday, an old painter living in the country is visited by his son Gonzague, coming with his wife and his three children. Then his daugther Irene arrives. She is always in a hurry, she lives alone and does not come so often... An intimist chronicle in which what is not shown, what is guessed, is more important than how it looks, dealing with what each character expects of life.","poster_path":"/3ijPonA8rJeIKp7iz0AGAM2dqoU.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18,10751],"popularity":9.335,"release_date":"1984-04-11","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":86},{"backdrop_path":"/mCcdLbGIve1RLGir7yJ9ACy2L7D.jpg","id":38577,"title":"The Old Man and the Sea","original_title":"Старик и море","overview":"An old fisherman makes the biggest catch of his life.","poster_path":"/fvzw2rXqSObcBc1RAIWYW7CzLuj.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[16,12,18],"popularity":11.497,"release_date":"1999-07-03","video":false,"vote_average":7.617,"vote_count":149},{"backdrop_path":"/12YKdvErSqcMp33ZeNe7MjSW06A.jpg","id":1986,"title":"Live and Become","original_title":"Va, vis et deviens","overview":"In 1980 the black Falashas in Ethiopia are recognised as genuine Jews and are secretly carried to Israel.
